name: You Move, I Move
description:
“You move, I move” is a 2D puzzle game based on Unity. When the player controls the character's movement, the enemy will also move. Player need to avoid enemies to reach the portal and enter the next level.

The game was produced in Global Game Jam in 2022, the theme is Duality. To challenge myself, I completed this project alone. The art and music resources are taken from the Unity Store, and I complete the programming part independently.
